languages.text: {n}Потрясенный Абеляр делает несколько шагов вперед, после чего тяжело опирается о край стола. Взгляд офицера прикован к бездыханному телу.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... да кто же посмел... неужели... крыса Войгтвир..."

{n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."
languages.original_text: {n}Потрясенный Абеляр делает несколько шагов вперед, после чего тяжело опирается о край стола. Взгляд офицера прикован к бездыханному телу.{/n} "Лорд-капитан... да кто же посмел... неужели... крыса Войгтвир..."

{n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德惊呆了。他朝前迈了几步，沉重地靠在桌边，目光死死地盯着西奥多拉的尸体。{/n}“舰长大人……究竟是谁，竟敢……除非……是维特威尔那个叛徒……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德惊呆了。他朝前迈了几步，沉重地靠在桌边，目光死死地盯着西奥多拉的尸体。{/n}“舰长大人……究竟是谁，竟敢……除非……是维特威尔那个叛徒……”

languages.text: {n}Abelard, aturdido, da unos pasos y se apoya en el borde del escritorio. No aparta la mirada del cuerpo de Theodora.{/n} «Lord Capitán... ¿Quién se atrevería?... Solo... Esa rata de Voigtvir...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, aturdido, da unos pasos y se apoya en el borde del escritorio. No aparta la mirada del cuerpo de Theodora.{/n} «Lord Capitán... ¿Quién se atrevería?... Solo... Esa rata de Voigtvir...».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは唖然として数歩前に進み、机の端に大きく寄りかかった。彼の目はシオドーラの死体に釘付けになっている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、一体誰が…ひょっとするとあのどぶねずみのボイトヴィルは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは唖然として数歩前に進み、机の端に大きく寄りかかった。 彼の目はテオドラの体に釘付けになっている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン…誰が一体…あのどぶねずみのボイドヴィルを除いては…」
{n}アベラルドは唖然として数歩前に進み、机の端に大きく寄りかかった。彼の目はシオドーラの死体に釘付けになっている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、一体誰が…ひょっとするとあのどぶねずみのボイトヴィルは…」

languages.text: {n}Abélard, abasourdi, fait quelques pas et s'appuie lourdement sur le rebord du bureau. Ses yeux sont rivés sur le corps de Théodora.{/n} « Seigneure-capitaine... Qui oserait... À moins que... ce rat de Voigtvir... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard, abasourdi, fait quelques pas et s'appuie lourdement sur le rebord du bureau. Ses yeux sont rivés sur le corps de Théodora.{/n} « Seigneure-capitaine... Qui oserait... À moins que... ce rat de Voigtvir... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard geht abwesend einige Schritte nach vorne und lehnt sich mit vollem Gewicht auf die Tischkante. Sein Blick ruht auf Theodoras Leiche.{/n} "Lord Captain ... Wer würde es wagen ...? Wenn nicht ... diese Ratte Voigtvir ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard geht abwesend einige Schritte nach vorne und lehnt sich mit vollem Gewicht auf die Tischkante. Sein Blick ruht auf Theodoras Leiche.{/n} "Lord Captain ... Wer würde es wagen ...? Wenn nicht ... diese Ratte Voigtvir ..."

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."

languages.text: {n}Şaşkına dönmüş Abelard, ileri birkaç adım atıp masanın kenarına tüm ağırlığıyla yaslanıyor. Gözü, Theodora'nın cansız bedenine takılıp kalıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Böyle bir şeye kim cüret?.. Yoksa... Voigtvir denen o sıçan..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard, stunned, takes a few steps forward and leans heavily on the edge of the desk. His eyes are locked on Theodora's body.{/n} "Lord Captain... Who would even dare... Unless... that rat Voigtvir..."
